actions.committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

official_title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the mandatory separation age for Federal firefighters be made the same as the age that applies with respect to Federal law enforcement officers.

summary.text: Amends Federal civil service law relating to the Civil Service Retirement System and the Federal Employees' Retirement System to change the mandatory separation age for Federal fire fighters from 55 to 57.

titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the mandatory separation age for Federal firefighters be made the same as the age that applies with respect to Federal law enforcement officers.
